description:
Dad suddenly declares "I will be Lord Buddha`s servant and do a good deed a day!" However, he misses his chance to give his seat to an old man on the bus and is mistaken as a kidnapper after reaching out to a lost child at the supermarket... Chi is brought to tears by some upperclassmen. He says he saw a store near "Shibuya" selling the popular "Sparkly `raser", but they won`t believe him.  Bunji and the rest set out to prove that Chi doesn`t lie.  The mothers are worried about their children as night has fallen and they have not come home.  Meanwhile, Bunji and the others have finally made it to the location of the Sparkly `raser they sought, but... While shopping, Mom has no idea what the gals are saying and Fumi explains.  Mom is listening interestedly, but she suddenly sees Fumi`s aspiring gaze at the gals!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Good Deed a Day is Now a Bowl of Noodles a Day / Missing Bunji and the Rest / Sparkly `Raser / Fumi`s Going to be a Mallrat?
一日一善 / 消えたぶんじたち / キラケシ / ふみ, ギャルになる
